metadata.Title: CVE-2023-28531 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low.
metadata.Description: ssh-add in OpenSSH before 9.3 adds smartcard keys to ssh-agent without the intended per-hop destination constraints. The earliest affected version is 8.9.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> openssh-ssh1 is provided for compatibility with old devices that cannot be upgraded to modern protocols. Thus we may not provide security support for this package if doing so would prevent access to equipment. sbeattie> introduced in openssh 8.9

criterions.comment: openssh package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
